notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: S.L. Yang conceived the study. H.F. Yang, H. Wu, B.W. Shi, Q. Zhu and W.X. Zhang conducted the field observation, data analyses and calculations. H.F. Yang wrote the draft of the manuscript and prepared the figures. S.L. Yang, K.H. Xu and Z.S. Yang contributed to the improvement of the manuscript. All authors reviewed the manuscript.
